    @pytest.mark.runthis
    @allure.story("Проверка корректной отправки формы обратной связи")
    def test_contactus_form_send(self):
        """Verifying that contact us form sends successfully"""
        contact_us = ContactUsPage(self.driver)
        contact_us.attach_txt_file(str(Path(pathlib.Path.cwd() / 'ContactUs form.txt')))
        contact_us.select_sh_dropdown_list_by_text("Customer service")
        contact_us.fill_email("hello@gmail.com")
        contact_us.fill_order("12345678")
        contact_us.fill_msg("Some message, abracadabra")
        contact_us.click_send_button()
        # assert contact_us.find_text_on_page("Your message has been successfully sent to our team.")
